name: parliament2_train_recalibrator
title: Parliament2 Recalibrator Training
summary: Train the Parliament2 Quality Score recalibrator using a truth set.

inputSpec.name: sv_caller_results
inputSpec.label: SV Caller Results
inputSpec.help: Raw output files from the individual SV callers.

inputSpec.name: svtyped_vcfs
inputSpec.label: Genotyped SV VCFs
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A set of genotyped variant calls. The genotyping method is orthogonal to the original caller, serving as bioinformatic cross-validation. Only produced if Genotype Candidates is set to True.

inputSpec.name: combined_genotypes
inputSpec.label: Combined Genotypes
inputSpec.help: (Optional) A file of merged, genotyped, validated SV calls. Only generated if Genotype Candidates is set to True.

outputSpec.name: contained_model
outputSpec.label: Contained Model Weights
outputSpec.help: Model weights to use for Parliament2 Quality Scoring

outputSpec.name: model_evaluation
outputSpec.label: Model Evaluation Logs
outputSpec.help: (Optional) Model statistics from evaluation and cross validation steps.
